name: Learning PALS Sight Words
description:
Interactive Sight Word learning tool designed for children from Pre-K to 2nd or 3rd grade. PALS Practice offers many different modes to suit your unique learning environment including:

  • Free Mode Practice - Learn sight words at your own pace, the word will not change until you click the next word button.
  • 3 Different Difficulties of practice - Word changes every 3, 4, or 5 seconds, can be paused for practice purposes.
  • Practice Test - Cycle through all words in the current list(77 of them), the word shows for 3 seconds and then disappears at which point the Teacher/Parent/Guardian will choose if the student/child successfully recited the word. Upon completion of the practice test, you are displayed a readout of correct and incorrect words, as well as a score percentage based on the number of correct words.

Ideal for Public and Private Schooling as well as Homeschooling and early learning Children.
